<CPTResponder> Protocol Reference

The basis of all event processing in Core Plot. More...

#include <CPTResponder.h>

Inheritance diagram for <CPTResponder>:
[legend]
Collaboration diagram for <CPTResponder>:
[legend]

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

User Interaction
BOOL pointingDeviceDownEvent:atPoint: (id event,[atPoint] CGPoint interactionPoint)
 Informs the receiver that the user has pressed the mouse button (Mac OS) or touched the screen (iPhone OS).
BOOL pointingDeviceUpEvent:atPoint: (id event,[atPoint] CGPoint interactionPoint)
 Informs the receiver that the user has released the mouse button (Mac OS) or lifted their finger off the screen (iPhone OS).
BOOL pointingDeviceDraggedEvent:atPoint: (id event,[atPoint] CGPoint interactionPoint)
 Informs the receiver that the user has moved the mouse with the button pressed (Mac OS) or moved their finger while touching the screen (iPhone OS).
BOOL pointingDeviceCancelledEvent: (id event)
 Informs the receiver that tracking of mouse moves (Mac OS) or touches (iPhone OS) has been cancelled for any reason.

Detailed Description

The basis of all event processing in Core Plot.

Member Function Documentation
